Characters and enemies have different resistances to [[Anemo]]. Character resistance can be increased or enemy resistances decreased by talents, constellations, or artifacts.

Certain abilities that cause the Elemental Reaction [[Swirl]] can also reduce resistances based on the element absorbed.

==Increasing Character Resistance==
===Elemental Resonance===
{{Main|Elemental Resonance}}
When in a party of 4 different elements, the Elemental Resonance [[Protective Canopy]] increases All Elemental RES and Physical RES by 15%.
